Auto Call Manager Settings Settings About Enable Record Disable Record Call recorder for android play your recorded call send your recorded call erase your recorded call Start record call End Record call Call deletion Are you sure you want to delete this recording? yes no Recording options Delete Play Send Your record from your phone This is a call record from your phone About Call recorder by Kobi Krasnoff and Raul Robledo Close Send Mail Withheld Number Call recording enabled Call recording disabled There are no recordings in this phone.
To enable record ability open the main menu and choose "Enable call recording".
After that the application will record all your incoming and outgoing calls. Enable call recording Disable call recording Please choose if the application should record your calls.
You can always enable or disable recording by pressing the Android menu button. Welcome Screen There is no memory card in your device.
Please install one. Close Terms of use Privacy Policy Terms of use Privacy Policy Please click the buttons below to see the terms of use and privacy policy Delete All recordings Delete everything? Are you sure you want to delete all of your recordings? Yes No Recording is now Starting The phone is now on a call If recording was enabled, recording should have started, if not you can enable recording in the application, the phone will stop the recording when the conversation ends Unfortunately, it is not possible to record calls in this device. (Usually because another application/service is using the microphone in the background)
///
Recording Call was recorded
You should contact lawyer before using this app Law Notes
Cancel Selected: %1$d
User Guide
1.If you click the Enable box, the service will be run on background.
2.Recording format set like amar/mp4 etc.
3.Save recording file path selection.
4. Show notification setting set to during call or after call.
Developer Information
This Application is developed by Umme Tahera Huda and Shipu Shikder
Supervised by : Md. Monir Hossain Organization : Dhaka City Collage todo Please choose if the application should record your calls.
You can always enable or disable recording.
//answer
Enabled? Answer Which Calls? Delay Before Answer? Force Speakerphone? Only Using BT Headset? Don't Answer if In Call? AutoAnswer Version 1.5
Copyright (c) 2010 EverySoft

A simple Android application that automatically answers incoming calls.

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program. If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses/.

Changes:
1.5 - new answer routine should support more phones (thanks to Tedd's Droid Tools!)

1.4 - added notification bar icon

1.3 - added experimental BT headset detection

1.2 - added support for froyo and the ability to ignore calls when there is already a call in process (ignore second call)

1.1 - added configurable delay before answer
